item.title: Fatal Distraction: Forgetting a Child in the Backseat of a Car Is a Horrifying Mistake. Is It a Crime? - The Washington Post
item.description: Fatal Distraction: Forgetting a Child in the Backseat of a Car Is a Horrifying Mistake. Is It a Crime? - The Washington Post Highlights “The easy thing in a case like this is to dump it on a jury, but that is not the right thing to do,” Mobley says.
